chapter:
Rescattering
Rescattering is going to be a thing.
Rescattering parameters
When on, rescattering occurs.
When on, particles that have rescattered can rescatter again.
When on, particles with short lifetimes can decay during rescattering calculations.
The timescale for the rescattering process. Particles will not decay or rescatter after this time.
The radius around the collision origin outside of which rescattering is not allowed.
